Text: Smoke and Fire (Sabrina Carpenter song):  Originally intended to be the lead single from her second studio album "Evolution", the song was dropped from the track listing; Carpenter later confirmed on Twitter to one fan (who asked why "Smoke and Fire" was not on the album) that the "evolution" came after "Smoke and Fire".
